Differences between OpenACC and OpenMP offloading models

Key Points

Talks
Introduction to Laplace Equation

  • Laplace equation can be solved with the use of iterative algorithm on a discretised computational grid
Serial Implementation

  • 2D Laplace equation solver is easy to implement. In the implementation we are using basic programming constructs like while and for loops.
Profiling

  • We have analysed the performance of the Laplace code with the use of GNU Gprof profiler

  • We have identified the most computationally expensive parts of the code - two loop nests executed in each iteration of the solver
Loop parallelisation

  • We have explored differences between OpenACC and OpenMP loop constructs for GPU parallelisation

  • We have an understanding of the difference between descriptive and prescriptive approach to GPU programming
Data management

  • We have successfully and significantly reduced the total number of memory transfers

  • We have significantly increased the performance of both GPU implementations
